definition.name: Card
definition.purpose: Container for grouping related content in a card layout
definition.description: A flexible and styled card component that serves as a container for grouping related UI content. It applies padding, border, background, and shadow, and supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the Card

visible: A styled card container with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card

definition.visualLayout: A vertical flex container with padding, border, rounded corners, and shadow
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.

definition.name: CardHeader
definition.description: A styled header section for the Card component, typically used to display the card's title and actions. Supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card header

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the CardHeader

visible: A styled card header section with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card header

definition.visualLayout: A grid container with padding and optional border, designed for card titles and actions
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.

definition.name: CardTitle
definition.description: A styled title section for the Card component, typically used to display the main heading of the card. Supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card title

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the CardTitle

visible: A styled card title section with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card title

definition.visualLayout: A div with font styling for card titles
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.

definition.name: CardDescription
definition.description: A styled description section for the Card component, typically used to display supporting text or a subtitle. Supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card description

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the CardDescription

visible: A styled card description section with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card description

definition.visualLayout: A div with muted text styling for card descriptions
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.

definition.name: CardAction
definition.purpose: Action section of a card for controls
definition.description: A styled section for placing action controls (such as buttons or menus) in the Card component, typically aligned to the top right. Supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card action

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the CardAction

visible: A styled card action section with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card action section

definition.visualLayout: A div aligned to the top right of the card header for action controls
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.

definition.name: CardContent
definition.description: A styled content section for the Card component, used to display the main content of the card. Supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card content

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the CardContent

visible: A styled card content section with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card content section

definition.visualLayout: A div with horizontal padding for card content
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.

definition.name: CardFooter
definition.description: A styled footer section for the Card component, typically used to display actions or summary information at the bottom of the card. Supports custom class names and props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the card footer

enabled: All props supported by a div element

when.description: Children are passed to the CardFooter

visible: A styled card footer section with children

effects: Renders the children inside the card footer section

definition.visualLayout: A flex container with horizontal padding for card footer content
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for class name merging. Accepts all div props.
